{{Location Intro|description=<p>{{If Self|Loch Urania|It|Loch Urania}} is a lake in Erinnyes Forest containing a large water vortex that forms a large bubble at the top.</p>}}

The lake is initially tainted by [[Contaminated Bacterial Mat]]s, causing high-speed winds that push the player away and a dark atmosphere even during daytime. After clearing the contamination during the {{Quest|Furious Mouth of the Spring}}, the winds dissipate and the sky clears up.

==Trivia==
===Etymology===
* The location name is likely a reference to {{w|Urania (disambiguation)|Urania}}, an {{w|Oceanid}} from Greek mythology.
** Loch Urania may also be related to the "Hateful Oceanid" Urania, the one-time boss from the [[Legend of the Vagabond Sword]] event.
